ROM.Changelog: * **Recommended Settings** - HDR+ Configuration: Nexus 6 Auto - Model: Pixel 2 / Pixel 2 XL (or Nexus 6P if you want more detailed images) - HDR+ Parameters: Medium (or higher) - To disable the HDR+ UI button: Settings > Advanced > HDR+ Control - To enable ZSL: Settings > Advanced > ZSL
